description: A reputable burger store meticulously crafts small yet flavorful and juicy burgers. Rather than overeating, try to savor these burgers as fine cuisine. It is located in the Xinyi District, conveniently near Exit 2 of the Taipei 101/World Trade Center MRT station.

product1.description: Classic burger with a small combo (NT$80 side and NT$80 drink).
product1.name: Classic with Small Combo

product2.description: Cod with yuzu tartar sauce and a chilled purple cabbage salad.
product2.name: Yuzu Cod

product3.description: The bear with wheat and black tea flavor.
product3.name: TOASTea Larger
